name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Zombies Chronicles Edition
summary: Call Of Duty Black Ops 3 III Chronicles HD Includes: Call Of Duty Black Ops 3 III Game 8 Classic Zombie Maps Remastered in HD Call Of Duty Black Ops 3 III Game Welcome to Call of Duty Black Ops III, a dark, twisted future where a new breed of Black Ops soldier emerges and the lines are blurred between our own humanity and the technology we created to stay ahead, in a world where cutting-edge military robotics define warfare. Players are deployed into a future featuring a new breed of Black Ops soldier Combines three unique game modes: Campaign, Multiplayer and Zombies Campaign is a cinematic game that can be played solo or with up to 4 players Multiplayer features new ways to rank up, customise and gear up for battle Zombies delivers an all-new mind-blowing experience with its own narrative
